tell me a funny story

Once upon a time, there was a little boy named Ben who loved to play with his friends. One day, he decided to take a walk in the park and play a game of tag. As he was running around, he stumbled and fell into a hole in the ground. He tried to get up, but it was too late. He was so scared that he started crying.
As he was trying to get up, he heard a loud noise coming from the other side of the hole. He ran over to see what was happening, and to his surprise, he found a group of animals playing in the park. They were all laughing and having a great time.
Ben was amazed by the animals' behavior and decided to join in. He started to play tag with them, and they were all having a great time too. They even started to play a game of hide-and-seek, and Ben was so happy that he couldn't stop laughing.
As the day went on, Ben and the animals continued to play and have a great time. They even started to play a game of hide-and-seek again, and Ben was so happy that he couldn't stop laughing.
In the end, Ben and the animals had a great time playing tag and playing hide-and-seek again. They even started to play a game of tag with each other, and Ben was so happy that he couldn't stop laughing.
From that day on, Ben and the animals became inseparable friends. They would often play tag and hide-and-seek together, and Ben would always be happy to see them again.
